nodes.text: Wesska was a female Human who worked as a weapons merchant during the Galactic War between the Galactic Republic and the Sith Empire. During the war, she operated a stall in the Alien Enclave Market of the city Voss-Ka on the planet Voss. Wesska wore brown and gray clothing while at her stall and had golden tattoos on either side of her face. She had dark skin, black hair and brown eyes.

Wesska first appeared in Star Wars: The Old Republic, an MMORPG released by BioWare in 2011. In the game she serves as a Republic and Imperial weapons vendor on the planet Voss. Her location is also marked on a map in Prima Games' Star Wars: The Old Republic Explorer's Guide.
